docs.lead_paragraph: For years, overweight women who become pregnant have been advised to limit their weight gain to 25 pounds over nine months.

headline.main: Less Weight Gain for Pregnant Women

docs.abstract: Experts say women who start their pregnancies very overweight should limit weight gain to 11 to 20 pounds.
docs.snippet: Experts say women who start their pregnancies very overweight should limit weight gain to 11 to 20 pounds.

docs.lead_paragraph: Updated, 11:29 p.m. | Duane Reade, the drugstore chain with more than 200 stores in the New York area, will pay $240,000 to settle a lawsuit brought by the federal Equal Employment Opportunity Commission claiming a pattern of sexual harassment and retaliation at one of its Bronx stores, the commission announced on Wednesday.

headline.main: Duane Reade Settles U.S. Harassment Suit

docs.abstract: The federal Equal Employment Opportunity Commission had sued over what it called a pattern of sexual harassment and retaliation at one of Duane Reade's stores in the Bronx. The chain will pay $240,000.
docs.snippet: The federal Equal Employment Opportunity Commission had sued over what it called a pattern of sexual harassment and retaliation at one of Duane Reade's stores in the Bronx. The chain will pay $240,000.

docs.lead_paragraph: African women have the world's highest death rates during pregnancy and birth. Tanzania, poor but politically stable, suffers from every problem that leads to these maternal deaths. But the country is also a case study in the ways that African nations are trying to improve the bleak statistics.

headline.main: Showcase: Lives on Edge at Birth

docs.abstract: African women have the world's highest death rates during pregnancy and birth. Tanzania suffers from every problem that leads to these maternal deaths. Béatrice de Géa created a slide show of those whose lives are in the balance, "Childbirth in Tanzania."

docs.lead_paragraph: More than half of the 536,000 women who die each year in pregnancy and childbirth are in Africa, according to the World Health Organization.
